resources.string: If checked, a notification will remain in the task bar reminding you of what Defense Condition you are in.
By default this application will show have a notification always in the task bar displaying what Defense Condition you are in. To change this, go to the Settings and uncheck the box.
Defcon one is the worst state of emergency. Everything\'s gone to hell. Cut your losses and get out.
Defcon two is very bad. Nearly everything is lost. There is little hope of success, but it\'s not over until it\'s over.
Defcon three is bad. Things are quite challenging and require lots of attention. Work hard and carefully and you\'ll make it out of here alive.
Defcon four requires an alert mind. There are major hints of things going wrong and you must address them immediately.
Defcon five is a state of peace. Remain alert to prevent entering Defcon 4, but there are no serious threats at this time.
